text: [Music]
hello I'm Daniel a cloud support
engineer here at the edibles office in
Northern Virginia sometimes customers
ask me how do I use transformations in a
DeBlase database migration service I
tell them that you can use
transformations to modify a schema table
or column for instance you can rename
add replace or remove a perfect suffix
or make a name uppercase or lowercase
you can define your transformational
rules by using the Adobe AIR CLI API or
the AWS DMS console for this video we'll
be doing this using the a SS DMS console
let's get started as you can see I've
already logged into the head of Laius
management console next navigate to the
AWS DMS console create your task
transformations complete all necessary
fields note when you hover on the I in a
black circle for each field you will see
more information about the field
you
in the table mapping section select
guided if you are comfortable with JSON
you can select the JSON tab and then
enter the mappings in the JSON format
and the selection rules section go to
the west section and then completely
follow and fills schema name you can use
the % to select all available schemas
tables or columns I'm going to choose a
schema table name is like choose all
tables and the actions section choose
either include or exclude
choose our selection rule button
you can add multiple rules batches in
the add selection rule again and by
going through the describe process
however you must have at least one rule
to be able to use transformations you
can also edit copy or delete a rule by
using the designated icons go to the
transformations section and complete the
following target choose any of the
following schema table or column in the
where section as needed because the
options change based on your selection
and the target section complete schema
name is table name is I have a table in
the schema called test date column name
is like I have a column called
ID
in the action section select any of the
following rename to remove column make
lowercase make uppercase add prefix
remove prefix replace prefix or suffix
remove suffix
replace suffix select the save
transformation rule button you can add
more transformation rules by selecting
the add transformation rule link we are
satisfied with their choices then choose
the create task button you can also do
this for existing tasks by using the
modified feature from the AWS DMS
console select tasks your task I have a
task that is stopped already select the
modify button expand the table map in
section and then you can either add a
new rule by choosing the link and then
add a transformation rule or edit an
existing rule by choosing the Edit icon
follow the instructions I just described
when you are done choose the modify
button
thanks for watching and happy cloud
computing from all of us here at AWS
[Music]
